name.en: The Fiend of the White Woods

text.en: Tribute 1 Synchro Monster, then target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects (until the end of this turn), then, if you Tributed a "White Woods" Synchro Monster at activation, you can Special Summon 1 Illusion monster from your GY. If this card is sent to the GY to activate a monster effect: You can Set this card. You can only use each effect of "The Fiend of the White Woods" once per turn.
